variables.name: snrA
variables.description: Signal to noise ratio for channel A

variables.name: snrB
variables.description: Signal to noise ratio for channel B

variables.name: mrxYaw
variables.description: Yaw orintation provided by MRX algorithm

variables.name: ang
variables.description: Receiver angular position in transmitter frame

variables.name: rel_pos_ned
variables.description: Relative Position of transmitter (offset from receiver)in NED (North East Down)

variables.name: rel_vel_ned
variables.description: Ralative velocity of tranmitter (offset from receiver) in NED (North East Down)

variables.name: rel_pos_frd
variables.description: Relative Position of transmitter (offset from receiver) in FRD (Forward Right Down)

variables.name: rel_vel_frd
variables.description: Ralative velocity of tranmitter (offset from receiver) in FRD (Forward Right Down)

variables.name: pos_wld
variables.description: World Position of transmitter  (Lat Lon Msl)

variables.name: vel_wld
variables.description: World velocity of tranmitter in NED (North East Down)

variables.name: abs_pos_ned
variables.description: Absolute position of transmitter (vehicle frame) in NED (North East Down)

variables.name: abs_vel_ned
variables.description: Absolute velocity of tranmitter (vehicle frame)in NED (North East Down)

variables.name: vehicle_abs_pos_ned
variables.description: Absolute Position of vehicle in NED (North East Down)

variables.name: vehicle_abs_vel_ned
variables.description: Absolute velocity of vehicle in NED (North East Down)

variables.name: predictionTime
variables.description: Interval to predict positions if no signal

variables.name: mavlinkFrames
variables.description: Mavlink V2 Frame variants to send
